thread.title: Groundbreaking on New Fabric Structure at River Cree Resort and Casino
thread.title_full: Groundbreaking on New Fabric Structure at River Cree Resort and Casino - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Groundbreaking on New Fabric Structure at River Cree Resort and Casino
text:
Legacy Building Solutions
EDMONTON, Alberta , Aug. 19, Legacy Building Solutions and the River Cree Resort and Casino have broken ground on The Venue, a new concert and event centre expected to open in the fall of 2015.
Following the sudden closing of the previous Venue at the River Cree after an engineering review found that the structure did not meet code, the management needed a new, code-compliant event space contracted, designed and constructed as quickly as possible. They turned to Legacy Building Solutions of Canada for a custom fabric structure on a rigid steel frame.
"Legacy was chosen because we were able to customize the new venue to meet the River Cree Resort and Casino's exact demands," said Jim Kumpula , general manager of Legacy Building Solutions Canada. "Our fast-track process means that the building will be ready for events within about four months, far less time than most builders can manage."
The new multi-purpose event centre will be 140 x 220 feet, with an additional lean-to for a full bar and additional storage. There will be a second-floor mezzanine with box seating, total capacity of up to 2,500, washrooms and a foyer with an indoor connection to the River Cree Resort and Casino.
The project is being delivered by Legacy Building Solutions of Canada as a construction management project.
About Legacy Building Solutions of Canada
Legacy Building Solutions of Canada is a custom designer, manufacturer and installer of engineered custom fabric structures. Legacy was the first to apply fabric to a rigid steel frame allowing for expanded design capabilities. Their patented fabric attachment system elevated the industry in safety, quality and customer satisfaction.
Legacy offers fast-track construction, concept to post-installation project management and service. Achieving ISO 9001:2008 and CSA 660, Legacy's commitment to quality and their customers is evident as you work with their experienced team.
For more information, contact Legacy Building Solutions of Canada at (780) 341-4140 or 877-259-1528, or visit www.legacybuildingsolutions.com .
